name: GKGoal
desc: An influence that motivates the movement of one or more agents.

items.name: init(toSeekAgent: GKAgent)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to move an agent toward the current position of the specified other agent.

items.name: init(toFleeAgent: GKAgent)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to move an agent away from the current position of the specified other agent.

items.name: init(toReachTargetSpeed: Float)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to accelerate or decelerate an agent until it reaches the specified speed.

items.name: init(toWander: Float)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to make an agent wander aimlessly, moving forward and turning at random.

items.name: init(toAvoid: [GKAgent], maxPredictionTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to make an agent avoid colliding with the specified other agents, taking into account the other agents’ movement.

items.name: init(toAvoid: [GKObstacle], maxPredictionTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to make an agent avoid colliding with the specified static obstacles.

items.name: init(toInterceptAgent: GKAgent, maxPredictionTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to make an agent pursue the specified other agent, taking into account the target’s movement.

items.name: init(toSeparateFrom: [GKAgent], maxDistance: Float, maxAngle: Float)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to make an agent maintain the specified distance from other agents in a specified group.

items.name: init(toAlignWith: [GKAgent], maxDistance: Float, maxAngle: Float)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to make an agent align its orientation with that of other agents in a specified group.

items.name: init(toCohereWith: [GKAgent], maxDistance: Float, maxAngle: Float)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to make an agent stay near the other agents in a specified group.

items.name: init(toStayOn: GKPath, maxPredictionTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to maintain an agent’s position within the specified path.

items.name: init(toFollow: GKPath, maxPredictionTime: TimeInterval, forward: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a goal whose effect is to both maintain position on and traverse the specified path.
